backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing publication state, access-controlled admin queries, and a holdings system with create, view, filter, and unlock logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing functionality and styling of various frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/docs/release/domain-strategy-an: Documentation explaining canonical and satellite domain strategy, redirect behavior, and DNS/SSL configuration.
frontend/docs/release/global-availabilit: Checklist for verifying DNS, custom domain mapping, and global availability before launch.
frontend/docs/release/go-live-runbook-20: Operational runbook detailing pre-launch checks, launch-day DNS cutover, publication activation, and rollback steps for March 15, 2026.
frontend/docs/release/launch-verificatio: Post-cutover checklist for verifying domain, HTTPS, DNS propagation, redirects, and site functionality after the March 15, 2026 launch.
frontend/docs/release/seo-homepage-metad: Describes updates to Spanish hero copy and SEO metadata, including titles, descriptions, and structured data.
frontend/docs/store-submission/android-g: Step-by-step guide for preparing, building, signing, and submitting the Android app to Google Play.
frontend/docs/store-submission/ios-app-s: Instructions for configuring Apple developer assets and building/submitting the iOS app to App Store Connect.
frontend/docs/store-submission/release-h: Central index linking all launch, submission, and asset documents for operators handling the March 15, 2026 release.
frontend/docs/store-submission/store-lis: Maps all pre-generated store listing assets to their required upload locations for Google Play and App Store.
Official Google Play listing text including app name, descriptions, what's new, keywords, and category.
Official App Store listing copy including subtitle, promotional text, description, keywords, and release notes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with comprehensive SEO, social meta tags, and structured data for the X39 Matrix website.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt specifying crawl rules, delays, disallowed paths, and sitemap location for search engines.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing key site URLs, priorities, update frequencies, multilingual alternates, and image metadata.
frontend/README-store-submission.md: Guide outlining steps for building and submitting the app to Google Play and Apple App Store.
frontend/release/release-notes.en.md: Release notes detailing features, design, integrations, and instructions for version 1.0.0 of X39 Matrix.
Tracks release milestones, store review statuses, metrics, and known issues for web, Android, and iOS.
frontend/release/store-submission-checkl: Checklist covering global readiness, build steps, assets, and store submission requirements for Android and iOS.
frontend/release/versions/android-releas: Documents Android version numbers, release notes reference, and version history for the initial 1.0.0 release.
frontend/release/versions/ios-release-ve: Documents iOS marketing version, build number, history, and update rules for the initial 1.0.0 release.
frontend/scripts/release/build-android-a: Shell script that validates keystore setup and builds a signed Android App Bundle for release.
frontend/scripts/release/build-ios-archi: Builds a signed iOS release archive using Xcode, verifies environment, cleans previous builds, and outputs the .xcarchive for App Store distribution.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component initializing providers, intro flow, background audio, navigation, language, and multiple homepage sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoLiv: Provides an admin-only toggle to switch the site between pre-launch and live states, showing status, errors, and success messages. Uses authentication and publication state hooks.
frontend/src/components/AndroidDownloadB: Renders an Android download button that links to Play Store, APK fallback, or a disabled state depending on configuration.
frontend/src/components/AndroidDownloadM: Displays a modal with PWA-based Android installation instructions and multilingual content.
frontend/src/components/AndroidMobileApp: Promotional section describing the Android app with visuals and feature highlights, linking to Play Store or APK when available.
frontend/src/components/AudioControl.tsx: Audio control widget providing play/pause, mute, and status display for background audio.
frontend/src/components/auth/X39LoginBut: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling. Toggles authentication and clears cached queries when logging out.
frontend/src/components/CharacterSelecti: Empty or placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ChopinVideoPlaye: Plays a 45‑second Chopin video with a countdown timer and calls onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/components/CinematicExperie: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Comecoco.tsx: Implements a Pac‑Man‑style canvas game with movement, ghosts, maze layout, scoring, and game states.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityDiag: Runs and displays connectivity diagnostics with tabs, status icons, and copyable reports.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityStat: Shows a dismissible top banner when connectivity checks fail, linking to diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/CopyableValue.ts: Displays a text value with a button to copy it to the clipboard and feedback on success.
frontend/src/components/CrossPlatformDis: Renders platform download options for Android, iOS, and web with fallback APK support.
frontend/src/components/CrossPlatformPro: Displays a stylized promotional banner highlighting the X39 Matrix token and official portal.
frontend/src/components/DailyNewsUpdates: Fetches and displays pinned and mock news items with loading, error handling, and a modal for selected news.
frontend/src/components/DavosOutcomesRep: Renders a stylized Davos outcomes report section with decorative visuals and structured analysis content.
frontend/src/components/DomainDnsVerific: Displays DNS and domain verification status, generates a detailed cutover report, and supports copying diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/ElementChatSecti: Provides a button linking to the Matrix Element chat with styled UI and a brief description.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and displays a recovery UI with reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/governance/Gover: Main governance wrapper that requires login and switches between proposal list and selected proposal detail views. Handles proposal selection state.
frontend/src/components/governance/Propo: Shows full details of a selected proposal, including vote breakdown and interactive voting if open. Handles vote submission, loading states, and back navigation.
Lists all proposals with status badges, brief descriptions, and vote counts. Allows selecting a proposal to view details.
Loads and displays ICP market chart data, computes RSI and trading signals, and handles errors and loading states.
frontend/src/components/header/HeaderTri: Creates an animated canvas effect of falling glowing triangles with performance-aware rendering. Manages particles, resizing, and animation lifecycle.
Sets up a Three.js holographic background with a rotating triangle, outline, particles, and animation loop, handling WebGL support and errors.
frontend/src/components/ICPDarkWebDanger: Displays a modal popup warning about Dark Web dangers with localized text, escape‑key handling, and scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/ICPPaymentGate.t: Renders a gated payment screen requiring a 1 ICP transfer, showing receiver info, previews, and Internet Identity hints.
frontend/src/components/ICPStakingButton: Button that opens the NNS staking site in a new tab with localized labels and hover effects.
Button linking to a specific ICP wallet dashboard page with localized text and styling.
frontend/src/components/InformacionVaria: Section with mixed ICP-related information, a playable Chopin video feature, and explanations of APIs and x39 CLI.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Full‑screen intro animation that fades out after two seconds, showing a holographic triangle and title before completing.
Provides a React context for language selection and string translation, including translation dictionaries for multiple languages.
frontend/src/components/LaunchDryRun.tsx: Runs connectivity and domain checks for a launch dry‑run, displaying pass/fail results and diagnostics with copyable reports.
frontend/src/components/legal/LegalDiscl: Renders a legal disclaimer section that switches between loading, pre-launch, and published states based on publication status.
frontend/src/components/LiveICPPrice.tsx: Fetches and displays live ICP price data with periodic updates, animations on change, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MainMenu.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/March15LaunchInf: Shows March 15, 2026 launch information when the publication state is live, with a button to open the launch dry‑run.
frontend/src/components/MatrixProtocolCu: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/MatrixProtocolFo: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/MatrixProtocolMe: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/OfficialWebsiteL: Displays the official site URL with copy and open actions, and shows the current origin for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceMetri: Generates and displays mock performance metrics for various platforms, refreshing automatically and manually.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/NnsBlu: Defines NNS-inspired blue theme color tokens, CSS class presets, and spacing constants for portfolio UI styling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Displays the portfolio header with title, subtitle, wallet icon, and login button using localized text.
Provides navigation buttons for switching between stake and governance tabs with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/X39Por: Wraps the portfolio interface, manages tab state with URL hash syncing, and renders stake or governance modules.
frontend/src/components/PremiumButton.ts: Renders a premium‑access button with tooltip and smooth scrolling to the premium section.
frontend/src/components/PremiumICPSectio: Provides styled premium ICP sections with animated visuals and two exported section components for content display.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeSection.ts: Loads a QR code script from multiple CDNs with retry logic and renders a dynamic QR code widget.
frontend/src/components/RedditPromoSecti: Renders a Reddit‑formatted promotional message with ICP updates and X39 Matrix launch details.
frontend/src/components/SourceCodeDispla: Displays multiple source files with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and styled code sections.
frontend/src/components/stake/CreateHold: Form component allowing users to create a new holding by entering amount and duration, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/stake/HoldingsLi: Fetches and displays user holdings with status badges, timestamps, and unlock/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/stake/StakeHoldM: Combines holding creation and listing components, showing a login-required prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/TokenAnalyticsPa: Shows mock token analytics metrics with formatted values and visual indicators for volume and flows.
frontend/src/components/TrochoDriveEleme: Displays the X39 Matrix logo with layered animated mist effects and a styled title label.
frontend/src/components/WalletRegistrati: Modal for selecting a wallet type, validating an address, and simulating registration with success handling.
frontend/src/components/X39HorseX39RainB: Canvas-based backdrop rendering animated X and 39 characters in a rain effect with resize and reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/components/X39ICPGame.tsx: Three.js/Fiber game components including player, enemies, collectibles, and scene logic with animation and state handling.
frontend/src/components/X39MatrixLaunchA: Full-screen canvas effect rendering animated Matrix‑style particles with color cycling and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/X39MatrixLaunchH: Hero section for the launch page with animated backgrounds, countdown hook, themed copy, and smooth‑scroll CTA.
frontend/src/components/X39TokenPromotio: Airdrop promotion section with visual effects, token info, and wallet registration modal for claiming tokens.
frontend/src/components/X39TokenRegistra: Renders a detailed token information section with mock X39 token data, animations, and design elements. Focuses on layout, visuals, and ecosystem contribution highlights.
frontend/src/config/distribution.ts: Centralizes Android, iOS, and web distribution URLs with helper functions for configuration checks.
frontend/src/config/launchDate.ts: Defines the mainnet launch date and provides helpers to check launch status and return a formatted date string.
frontend/src/config/launchPayment.ts: Stores the launch-time ICP payment receiver principal and provides utility accessors and labels for display and QR use.
frontend/src/content/homeHeroCopy.ts: Contains static homepage hero text including title, subtitle, and supporting copy.
Markdown legal disclaimer outlining risks, no advice, liability limits, user responsibilities, and ICP notes.
frontend/src/hooks/governance/useProposa: React-query hooks for fetching proposals, fetching a single proposal, and submitting votes with cache invalidation.
Hooks to fetch, create, unlock, and delete user token holdings, refreshing related queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/publication/usePublic: Hooks to read publication state, check admin status, and update publication visibility with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundAudio.ts: Manages a 45‑second background audio clip including load state, playback, mute persistence, timers, and autoplay logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectivityDiagno: Runs frontend diagnostics checking domain, HTTPS, and backend health, producing structured status checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainRedirect.ts: Redirects clients from satellite or www domains to the canonical portal while preserving URL components.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLaunchCountdown.ts: Implements a countdown hook that calculates time remaining until a fixed launch date and updates every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks to fetch the caller's user profile, backend health, and a receiver principal via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind, custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode, fonts, neon effects, animations, and responsive text utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/services/icpMarketData.ts: Fetches ICP price and kline data from Binance with timeout handling and fallback to a backend proxy, including data validation and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/urls.ts: Provides domain-safe URL utilities including canonical domain checks, hostname extraction, building URLs, and satellite domain detection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind for the frontend, defining content paths, custom fonts, HSL-based theme colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architectural notes, and known issues, documenting the current app state, tech stack, token portal features, and deployment/domain blockers.
